name: setup-sbt
description: Fetches and installs specified version of sbt launcher, for use in subsequent steps.
helpMarkDown: Fetches and installs [sbt](https://www.scala-sbt.org) launcher, for use in subsequent steps.
author: Duchessa Team

inputs.name: sbtVersion
inputs.label: SBT Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number of [sbt launcher](https://www.scala-sbt.org) to be installed.
